mapper.sql: SELECT LICENSE_ID AS H_KEY, LICENSE_NAME AS H_TITLE, '300' AS H_TYPE FROM LICENSE_MASTER UNION ALL SELECT OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, '301' FROM OSS_MASTER UNION ALL SELECT PRJ_ID, PRJ_NAME, '303' FROM PROJECT_MASTER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HISTORY (H_KEY, H_TITLE, H_TYPE, H_COMMENT, H_ETC, MODIFIER, MODIFIED_DATE, H_ACTION, H_DATA) VALUES(#{hKey}, #{hTitle}, #{hType}, #{hComment}, #{hEtc}, #{modifier}, #{modifiedDate}, #{hAction}, #{hData})
mapper.select:
SELECT IDX , H_KEY , H_TITLE , H_TYPE , (SELECT CD_NM FROM T2_CODE WHERE CD_NO = H_TYPE) AS H_TYPE_NM , H_COMMENT , H_ETC , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_DATE , H_ACTION FROM HISTORY WHERE 1=1
AND H_TYPE = #{hType}
AND H_ETC LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hEtc},'%')
AND H_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hTitle},'%')
AND MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND H_ACTION = #{hAction}
AND MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND MODIFIED_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND MODIFIED_DATE <= #{endDate}
ORDER BY IDX
ORDER BY H_TITLE
ORDER BY H_TYPE_NM
ORDER BY H_ACTION
ORDER BY MODIFIER
ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE
ASC
DESC

SELECT A.IDX, A.H_KEY, B.H_TITLE, A.H_TYPE, C.CD_NM AS H_TYPE_NM , A.H_COMMENT , A.H_ETC, A.MODIFIER, A.MODIFIED_DATE, A.H_ACTION, A.H_DATA FROM HISTORY A INNER JOIN () B ON A.H_KEY = B.H_KEY AND A.H_TYPE = B.H_TYPE LEFT JOIN T2_CODE C ON A.H_TYPE = C.CD_NO WHERE IDX = #{idx}
SELECT IDX, H_KEY, H_TITLE, H_TYPE, H_COMMENT, H_ETC, MODIFIER, MODIFIED_DATE, H_ACTION, H_DATA FROM HISTORY WHERE H_KEY = #{hKey} AND H_TYPE = #{hType} AND IDX < #{idx} ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 1
